pages.title: Longfin Batfish
pages.text: Platax teira, also known as the teira batfish, longfin batfish, longfin spadefish, or round faced batfish is a fish from the Indo-West Pacific.$(br2)It occasionally makes its way into the aquarium trade.$(br2)It grows to a size of 60 cm ($(o)24 in$()) in length.

pages.title: Longfin Batfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sea_grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
